Definition: In this task, you are given a text. You need to output "Yes" if the text is generally about a person, and "No" if not. Mentions of people in the text don't necessarily mean the text is about a person.

Positive Examples.input: Text:  The third and current HMS Argyll is a Type 23 'Duke' Class frigate. She is currently the oldest serving Type 23 frigate in the Royal Navy. Like all of her class she is named for a British dukedom in this case that of Argyll.
Positive Examples.explanation: HMS Argyll is a frigate which a warship. Clearly the text is not about a person. Hence, the answer is No.

Positive Examples.input: Text: Alison Bechdel (/ˈbɛkdəl/ BEK-dəl; born September 10 1960) is an American cartoonist. Originally best known for the long-running comic strip Dykes to Watch Out For she came to critical and commercial success in 2006 with her graphic memoir Fun Home.
Positive Examples.explanation: Alison Bechdel is an American cartoonist. Clearly the text is about a person. The answer should be Yes.

Negative Examples.input: Text:  The third and current HMS Argyll is a Type 23 'Duke' Class frigate. She is currently the oldest serving Type 23 frigate in the Royal Navy. Like all of her class she is named for a British dukedom in this case that of Argyll.
Negative Examples.explanation: HMS Argyll is a frigate which a warship. Clearly the text is not about a person. Hence, it is an incorrect answer and a negative example.

Negative Examples.input: Text: Alison Bechdel (/ˈbɛkdəl/ BEK-dəl; born September 10 1960) is an American cartoonist. Originally best known for the long-running comic strip Dykes to Watch Out For she came to critical and commercial success in 2006 with her graphic memoir Fun Home.
Negative Examples.explanation: The output is neither "Yes" nor "No". Hence, it is an incorrect answer and a negative example.

Instances.input: Text:  Biljevec is a village in Croatia.

Text:  Solo-Duo is a compilation album released after Kenny Drew's death in 1996 consisting of dates recorded in the years of 1966 1977 and 1983. The album features solo work as well as duo work performed on separate dates with double-bassists Bo Stief and Niels-Henning Ørsted Pedersen.

Text:  Achen Pass (el. 941 n.) is a mountain pass in the Alps in the state of Bavaria in Germany.The pass is located in the southwest corner of the Miesbach District (Landkreis Miesbach) about 1 km north of the border with Austria in the south of Bavaria. It connects the valley of the Tegernsee in the north with the Achen valley in Tyrol in the south. It divides the watershed of the Danube and the Inn.As early as 1495 the pass road was an important commercial route for bringing salt to Munich.

Text:  Terrence William James Ryan (born January 14 1977) is a retired Canadian professional ice hockey player. He was drafted by the Montreal Canadiens eighth overall in the 1995 NHL Entry Draft and played eight games with the organization between 1996 and 1999.
Text:  Coalition: the Hip-Hop Alliance is a compilation album under ForeFront Records. It was produced by Pigeon John for the Telephone Company.
Text:  Mierzwice-Kolonia [mjɛʐˈvit͡sɛ kɔˈlɔɲa] is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Sarnaki within Łosice County Masovian Voivodeship in east-central Poland.
Text:  Pałecznica-Kolonia [pawɛt͡ʂˈnit͡sa kɔˈlɔɲa] is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Niedźwiada within Lubartów County Lublin Voivodeship in eastern Poland.

Text:  Matthias Steiner (born 25 August 1982 in Vienna) is an Austrian-German weightlifter and Olympic gold medalist. As a native Austrian he competed for Austria internationally from 1998 to 2005 in European Championships World Championships and the 2004 Summer Olympics. From 2002 to 2005 he was four times Austrian National Champion in the +105 kg category and holds Austrian records in the −105 kg and +105 kg categories.
